column5: I took the day off work today.  With all that snow on our front lawn, and a bored 5 year old inside the house, we decided to head to the front yard...I gave her a shovel and said go make a hole in the yard...LOL.  Here's what it looked like before we started...   That worked for about a minute...she then said, "I need help daddy".  So, I went out and dug a huge hole in the ground that measured maybe 3 by 4 feet.  Here's a shot of her standing in it.....   Then she informed me that just one hole was boring and could I make a hallway and a bedroom?  I just laughed, but she was dead serious.  20 minutes later, with me out of breath, she walked through her new house and tried it out....   She THEN informed me that she needed stairs because it was too hard for her to get in and out of her new house....10 minutes later and here they are....   Then came the final inspection...I was out of breath, ready for a nap....you can see the stairs, the first room, the hallway and the bedroom.   I told her it was time to head inside for hot chocolate, but she said "Daddy...we cant go yet...my bedroom is too small and where am I supposed to eat?".  I just looked at her completely flabbergasted....sweat pouring off my face and said "Are you serious?".  She put her hands on her hips and said "Do I look like it?"  We ended up coming inside...the third room and expansion will have to come tomorrow....LOL.  Here's a final shot of her making a secret entrance to her room....   I get to go back to work tomorrow so I can relax....LOL.
